title: Nike Mashup
imageCaption: CREATIVE DIRECTION / CAMPAIGN / BRAND / ART DIRECTION / DESIGN
description: An artistic mash-up of nike shoes, athletes, and respective geographies
richtext:
This campaign combines nike basketball shoes with geographic iconography from the regions each player represents.
